name: Instacktable
description:
Instacktable is an innovative puzzle-platformer where every move you make is a precious resource.

Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam, Instacktable follows an adorable robot as it navigates a mad scientist's lab . Unfortunately, this robot's memory is... not quite up to par.

You'll have to be careful as you collect new controls, since every new option pushes out another!

Note for GMTK Jam voters: Congratulations, you're playing a super-ultra alpha version! Enjoy the levels we finished, and watch this space!
